**Summary**
• Qualcomm and BMW are cooking up a driver-assist system that lets you ditch the wheel on approved roads.
• This bad boy uses Qualcomm’s Snapdragon Ride platform, which is basically a supercomputer for your car.
• It’s all about leveling up the driving experience while keeping safety on a hundred.

Impact — This partnership is a huge flex for Qualcomm, solidifying its spot in the auto tech game.
